SqlQuery.Data: SELECT reference.ref_tag as ref_tag, reference_system.ref_system_name as ref_system_name FROM reference LEFT JOIN sig_reference on reference.ref_id = sig_reference.ref_id LEFT JOIN signature on sig_reference.sig_id = signature.sig_id LEFT JOIN reference_system on reference.ref_system_id = reference_system.ref_system_id WHERE signature.sig_id = @0 ORDER BY sig_reference.ref_seq
